metadata.dc:author: Olarte, J
metadata.dc:description: The role played by different groups of microorganisms, including aerobic and anaerobic bacteria, viruses, etc., on acute and chronic infections of urinary ducts is discussed, together with general aspects of pathogenesis and diagnosis of such infections.

[Etiology of urinary infections].
